title: ESPN Super bouts. Vol. 11
brief_description: Features the 1979 World Middleweight Championship bout between Marvellous Marvin Hagler and defending champion Vito Antuofermo at Ceasar’s Palace, Las Vegas, Nevada, November 1979. It was a case of Hagler’s strength against the heart of mauler and brawler Antuofermo. The bout resulted in a 15 round draw. Includes a match debrief by Al Bernstein and Sam Smith.
